Description: The Holy Family at a Fountain; the Virgin represented as the Beautiful Virgin of Regensburg, scene set in a Gothic chapel, fountain surmounted by nude male heathen figure. Woodcut
Curator's comments: See 1895,0122.366 for further information about this print.
Bibliographic references: New Hollstein (German) / The New Hollstein: German engravings, etchings and woodcuts 1400-1700 (w.47) (Altdorfer)
Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (II.226.47) (cf)
